Posts.EditableText:
I have been playing around with the ASL script and have a question.  Is there any way to add traditional programming "remarks/comments" to the ASL code?  

Thank you in advance for any help.
Posts.HTML:
I have been playing around with the ASL script and have a question. Is there any way to add traditional programming "remarks/comments" to the ASL code?

Thank you in advance for any help.

Posts.EditableText: A single apostrophe or the ' character. Anything after that is commented.
Posts.HTML: A single apostrophe or the ' character. Anything after that is commented.
